title: Almond chicken Italienne
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets, sliced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 sticks of celery, finely sliced', '1 medium onion, diced', '2 cloves of garlic, chopped', '175g (6 oz) pasta of your choice', 'Good sprinkle of dried or fresh Italian herbs', '4 baby plum tomatoes, quartered', '4 large sundried tomatoes packed in oil, sliced', '6 black olives, halved', '2 tablespoons flaked almonds', 'Salt and pepper', '200ml (7 fl oz) water', '2 dessertspoons of green pesto', '50g (2 oz) wild rocket', 'Shavings of fresh Parmesan']
